SELECT /* VacationMapper.xml selectAllVacationInfo */ RNUM, T2.VACATION_APPLY_NO, T2.APPLY_DT, T2.START_DT, T2.END_DT, T2.BEFORE_COUNT_DAYS, T2.AFTER_COUNT_DAYS, T2.VACATION_STATUS, T2.FULLNAME, T2.START_TYPE_K, T2.END_TYPE_K, T2.KOREAN_CODE_NAME, T2.START_TYPE, T2.END_TYPE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, T1.VACATION_APPLY_NO, T1.APPLY_DT, T1.START_DT, T1.END_DT, T1.BEFORE_COUNT_DAYS, T1.AFTER_COUNT_DAYS, T1.VACATION_STATUS, T1.FULLNAME, T1.START_TYPE_K, T1.END_TYPE_K, T1.KOREAN_CODE_NAME, T1.START_TYPE, T1.END_TYPE FROM ( SELECT V.VACATION_APPLY_NO, V.APPLY_DT, V.START_DT, V.END_DT, V.BEFORE_COUNT_DAYS, V.AFTER_COUNT_DAYS, V.VACATION_STATUS, M.FULLNAME, C1.KOREAN_CODE_NAME START_TYPE_K, C2.KOREAN_CODE_NAME END_TYPE_K, C3.KOREAN_CODE_NAME, C1.CODE_ID START_TYPE, C2.CODE_ID END_TYPE FROM DAYSIDE_VACATION V, DAYSIDE_MEMBER M, DAYSIDE_CODE C1, DAYSIDE_CODE C2, DAYSIDE_CODE C3 WHERE V.EMPLOYEE_NO = M.EMPLOYEE_NO AND V.VACATION_STATUS = C3.CODE_ID AND V.START_TYPE = C1.CODE_ID AND V.END_TYPE = C2.CODE_ID AND (TO_CHAR(V.START_DT,'YYYY') = #{selectYear} OR TO_CHAR(V.END_DT,'YYYY') = #{selectYear})
AND V.EMPLOYEE_NO = #{value}
AND M.FULLNAME LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
ORDER BY V.VACATION_APPLY_NO DESC) T1 ) T2 WHERE T2.RNUM >= (#{currPage}-1)*10+1 AND T2.RNUM <= (#{currPage}-1)*10+10
SELECT /* VacationMapper.xml getVacationApplySeq */ DAYSIDE_VACATION_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT /* VacationMapper.xml insertVacationInfo */ INTO DAYSIDE_VACATION VALUES( #{vacationApplyNo}, #{employeeNo}, SYSDATE, #{startDt}, #{endDt}, #{startType}, #{endType}, #{countDays}, 'VACATION_APPROVAL', #{beforeCountDays}, #{afterCountDays})
mapper.delete: UPDATE /* VacationMapper.xml deleteVacationInfo */ DAYSIDE_VACATION SET VACATION_STATUS='VACATION_CANCEL' WHERE VACATION_APPLY_NO = #{vacationApplyNo}
mapper.select: SELECT /* VacationMapper.xml selectOneVacationInfo */ V.VACATION_APPLY_NO, V.EMPLOYEE_NO, M.FULLNAME, V.START_DT, V.START_TYPE, V.END_DT, V.END_TYPE FROM DAYSIDE_VACATION V, DAYSIDE_MEMBER M WHERE V.EMPLOYEE_NO = M.EMPLOYEE_NO AND V.VACATION_APPLY_NO = #{vacationApplyNo}
SELECT /* VacationMapper.xml selectVacationStatus */ VACATION_STATUS, EMPLOYEE_NO FROM DAYSIDE_VACATION WHERE VACATION_APPLY_NO = #{vacationApplyNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE /* VacationMapper.xml updateVacationInfo */ DAYSIDE_VACATION SET APPLY_DT = SYSDATE, START_DT = #{startDt}, END_DT = #{endDt}, START_TYPE = #{startType}, END_TYPE = #{endType}, COUNT_DAYS = #{countDays}, BEFORE_COUNT_DAYS = #{beforeCountDays}, AFTER_COUNT_DAYS = #{afterCountDays} WHERE VACATION_APPLY_NO = #{vacationApplyNo}
mapper.select: SELECT /* VacationMapper.xml countAllVacation */ COUNT(*) CNT FROM DAYSIDE_VACATION V, DAYSIDE_MEMBER M WHERE V.EMPLOYEE_NO = M.EMPLOYEE_NO AND (TO_CHAR(V.START_DT,'YYYY') = #{selectYear} OR TO_CHAR(V.END_DT,'YYYY') = #{selectYear}) AND V.EMPLOYEE_NO = #{value} AND M.FULLNAME LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
